Package fish.yukiemeralis.eden.auth.old

Class Permissions

java.lang.Object
fish.yukiemeralis.eden.auth.old.Permissions
@Deprecated public class Permissions extends Object
Deprecated.
Permissions are now handled by permission groups.

      Returns:

    • createNewAccount

      @Deprecated public static void createNewAccount(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender, SecurePlayerAccount.AccountType type, String username)
      Deprecated.
      Permissions are now handled by permission groups.
      Intended to be the used in conjunction with a command, the user will be prompted for a password for the account they wish to create.
      Parameters:
      sender - The user intending to create this account
      type - The rank of this account
      username - The username of this account

    • isAuthorized

      @Deprecated public static boolean isAuthorized(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender, SecurePlayerAccount.AccountType minimum)
      Deprecated.
      Permissions are now handled by permission groups.
      Checks to see if a specific commandsender is authorized to access a resource
      Parameters:
      sender - The commandsender
      minimum - The minimum allowed account rank to access a given resource
      Returns:
      True if the commandsender is authorized, false if not

    • expectPassword

      @Deprecated public static void expectPassword(org.bukkit.entity.Player target, String username)
      Deprecated.
      Permissions are now handled by permission groups.
      Primes ChatUtils to expect a user's password in chat.
      Parameters:
      target - The player to expect from
      username - The account to expect the password from

    • genHash

      public static String genHash(String password)
      Deprecated.
      Generates a hash for a given string. Useful for passwords and other data that we don't want to be stored in plaintext
      Parameters:
      password - The input string
      Returns:
      A string hash for the given input

    • comparePassword

      @Deprecated public static boolean comparePassword(SecurePlayerAccount account, String input)
      Deprecated.
      Permissions are now handled by permission groups.
      Compares an input string to an account's password
      Parameters:
      account - The account to check against
      input - The input to hash and check
      Returns:
      True if the input, when hashed, matches the account's password hash, false if not

    • login

      @Deprecated static void login(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender user, String username)
      Deprecated.
      Logs a player into a secure player account.
      Parameters:
      user - The player to log in
      username - The username of the account to log in to\

    • login

      @Deprecated public static void login(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender user, String username, String password_plaintext)
      Deprecated.
      Permissions are now handled by permission groups.
      Attempts to log a user into a secure account
      Parameters:
      user - The commandsender to log in
      username - The username of the account to log into
      password_plaintext - The supposed password, in plaintext, for the given account

    • logout

      @Deprecated public static boolean logout(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender user)
      Deprecated.
      Permissions are now handled by permission groups.
      Logs a user out of a secure account
      Parameters:
      user - The user to logout
      Returns:
      True if the user was successfully logged out, false if not

    • accountExists

      @Deprecated public static boolean accountExists(String username)
      Deprecated.
      Permissions are now handled by permission groups.
      Returns if an account exists or not. Does NOT return the account itself
      Parameters:
      username - The possible username of an account
      Returns:
      If an account exists and has been loaded into memory
